title: Shiny Econometrics Apps
text:
Welcome!
This site collects interactive Shiny apps I use in my econometrics teaching.


Explore endogeneity (ρ), instrument strength (γ₁), first stage, reduced form, and the weak-instrument F-test.

 🚀 Open App      💻 Source Code
